[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/package-deps-hash](./package-deps-hash.md) &gt; [getRepoChanges](./package-deps-hash.getrepochanges.md)

## getRepoChanges() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Find all changed files tracked by Git, their current hashes, and the nature of the change. Only useful if all changes are staged or committed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getRepoChanges(
  currentWorkingDirectory: string,
  revision?: string,
  gitPath?: string
): Map<string, IFileDiffStatus>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter               | Type   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| ----------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| currentWorkingDirectory | string | The working directory. Only used to find the repository root.                                                                                                                                                                  |
| revision                | string | The Git revision specifier to detect changes relative to. Defaults to HEAD (i.e. will compare staged vs. committed) If comparing against a different branch, call <code>git merge-base</code> first to find the target commit. |
| gitPath                 | string | The path to the Git executable                                                                                                                                                                                                 |

<b>Returns:</b>

Map&lt;string, [IFileDiffStatus](./package-deps-hash.ifilediffstatus.md) &gt;

A map from the Git file path to the corresponding file change metadata
